meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of hair
meanings.sent1: The fluffy kitten was pily all over its body.
meanings.sent2: The teddy bear's pily coat was comforting to touch.
meanings.sent3: The pily blanket kept the baby warm and cozy.
meanings.sent4: The forest floor was a pily carpet of fallen leaves.
meanings.sent5: The pily squirrel darted up the tree with agility.

meanings.sent1: Her pily scarf felt gentle against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The bunny's pily fur was a delight to stroke.
meanings.sent3: The pily clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent4: The pily petals of the flower danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The pily pillow provided a comfortable place to rest.

meanings.definition: Full of or resembling hair or fur
meanings.sent1: The pily caterpillar crawled slowly along the branch.
meanings.sent2: The cozy sweater was pily and warm on a chilly day.
meanings.sent3: The pily rug added a touch of warmth to the room.
meanings.sent4: The pily fabric of the blanket was soft to the touch.
meanings.sent5: The pily dog wagged its tail happily as it played.
